well im back frome venice beach! yay i had a lot of fun out there. I want to move out there!!!!! We went to a mall to called the block. ahh that mall is cool. they have a bowling alley, movie theater, and an arcade. I love it. 

Hm. well Today I went to matthews. I hung out with him there. And then we went the skate park and then bowling. I had fun seeing him today even though he bit and pinched the hell out of my arm. which i have bruises and marks from his teeth there now! But i love him cause we can just have so much fun and not even care like when we spit on each other i couldnt do that with any of my other boyfriends or else they would kick my ass. hahaha. I LOVE HIM SOO MUCH. 

<3 <3 <3

Love means...

A girl and guy were speeding over 100 mph on the road...


Girl: Slow down. Im scared.

Guy: This is fun!!!! Hold on to me.

Girl: No its not. Please, its too scary!

Guy: Then tell me you love me.

Girl: I love you, please, slow down.

Guy: Now please give me a big hug!

*Girl hugs him*

Guy: Can you take my helmet off baby? It's bugging me..


In the paper the next day: A motorcycle had crashed into a building because of break failure. 2 ppl were on it but only 1 survived. The truth was that halfway down the road, the guy realizd that his breaks broke, but he didn't want to let the girl know. Instead, he had her say she loved him &felt her hug 1 last time, then had her wear his helmet so that she would live even though it meant that he would die.


if u love someone this much...let them no..and put this in ur profile
http://mywordsrfading.livejournal.com/7024.html

Looking in your eyes, I see a paradise.
This world that I found is too good to be true.
Standing here beside you,
I want so much to give you 
This love in my heart that I'm feeling for you.


Let them say we're crazy.
I don't care about that.
Put your hand in my hand, baby, don't ever look back.
Let the world around us just fall apart.
Baby, we can make it if we're heart to heart.


And we can build this thing together, 
Stand in stone forever, 
Nothing's gonna stop us now.
And if this world runs out of lovers we'll still have eachother.
Nothing's gonna stop us, nothing's gonna stop us now.


I'm so glad I found you, I'm not gonna lose you, 
Whatever it takes to stay here with you.
Take it to the good times, 
See it through the bad times.
Whatever it takes is what I'm gonna do.


Let them say we're crazy.
What do they know?
Put your arms around me, baby, don't ever let go.
Let the world around us just fall apart.
Baby, we can make it if we're heart to heart.


Oh, all that I need is you.
All that I ever need.
All that I want to do is hold you forever, forever and ever.

Today I went to Matty's house ♥. I had a lot of fun there. Me and matty were wrestling and I spit on his face! and of course he got me back. I love that we can mess around like that. I actually had a super time hanging out with him. We got in one little argument but then he dropped it. 
Last night though we got in a huge fight. I started crying it was very sad. He was telling me how he wants me to be the happiest i can be and all sorts of stuff like that. And i just started crying. What did I ever do to deserve him. He soo amazingly good to me. He makes me sooooooooooooo happy. 

Matty, im so sorry for anything i have put you through and if i have ever hurt you im soooo sorry. Its never my intension to hurt you. I LOVE YOU!
<3<3<3

http://mywordsrfading.livejournal.com/1930.html

A lot of things are on my mind. This year has started out to be a really shitty year. Besides the fact that i met My love Matty. Everything that could of went wrong this year went wrong. I wish i could just rewind back to where i first screwed up and do it all over again. Its hard waking up everyday and trying to feel like everything is the same that i never hurt my dad or anything. But i did. and it hurts me. All i do is screw up. Its like things can never be the same between me and my dad again. He told me he can never trust me again. and it just hurts. i want to be close to my dad. its just not going to happen after everything i did. No matter how many apology letters i write him. no matter what i do. It wont be the same. Now its hard for me to get out of this house because im not trusted and im grounded for all of eternity. Im only allowed at certain places. Like matty's or Ashley's. Thats it. Im just a big letdown to everyone in some way or another.
<3<3<3
http://mywordsrfading.livejournal.com/1765.html

Friends. what can i say about them? unfortunately today one of mine friends,Tiffany G. decided that she should call me a dumb bitch behind my back. me and my friend alecia three wayed her because she didnt invite alecia to her birthday sleepover so Alecia said well tiffani told me that you were having a birthday sleepover and so Tiffany G. decided to call me a dumb bitch for telling alecia the truth while she sat there and lied to alecia. But whatever its just drama. I just thought that friends dont call friends dumb bitches. and Unfortunately my friend does. =/  
<3 <3 <3

http://mywordsrfading.livejournal.com/776.html

Today is the 27th therefore it is mine and matty's 5 month anniversery haha. its my longest relationship. im so happy. but we got in another fight.=( its so upseting. im so sick of fights i hate them. {words from blink 182} but i really am sick of it. we got in a huge fight at his house the other night. he wouldnt talk to me and i didnt want to talk to him. it was sad. i love him so much though. =) i mean i hate fights but i will deal with them just for him. but i love the way he actually cares about me and what i do. other guys would just be like o thats cool. or o that sucks. but i like that he yells at me when i do something wrong. it shows me that he cares. he has always been there for me. he means sooo much to me!!! well now that i have been going on and on about him. i will put it to a stop.

<3<3<3
http://mywordsrfading.livejournal.com/667.html

Uhh.. i hate being grounded. all i do is watch tv and eat. although the tv does get intresting i just dont like sitting around. i want to move about. well hmm. i got to see my boyfriend today! yippee. i missed him. i love him but we get in a lot of fights mainly about stupid things just because i like to argue with whatever he has to say. so he tried telling my we have problems. but i think that fighting is normal. like he said, at least we do fight or else one day we would get into a really big fight and just break up. we wouldn't want that to happen. but its noraml at least we know we care enough about each other to fight about it. even though i hate it very much. no one can get along perfect. well Nyles is in town now. thats good for him i fell bad because hes stuck out in california and hes always telling me how he wants to be here in shit hole vegas. uhh i have nothing to do and its late in the night or early in the morning which ever one you want to use. and im not tired just super bored with no one to talk to because boyfriend hasnt called. I went to the dentist today. I didnt really like it but when i came out my teeth were mighty shiny! Then i have to go to the orthadontist because i need braces.=/ well im doing writing for now.
<3
